module.name: Call Recording Report
module.description: COMMERCIAL MODULE REQUIRES A LICENSE FOR IT TO FUNCTION. Please visit www.schmoozecom.com/oss.php - Displays various information related to the voicemail system. This is a non standard module and requies a license for it to work
module.changelog: *2.11.0.9* Sales cleanup *2.11.0.6* #7266 *2.11.0.3* Fix missing play.png img *2.11.0.2* Fix issue where correct files were being archived not saved *2.11.0.1* Packaging of ver 2.11.0.1 *2.11.0.0* Bump for 2.11 *2.10.0.32* Resolve view issues
